quote: Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it. – Robert Frost
fact: For some time Frederic Chopin, the composer and pianist, wore a beard on only one side of his face, explaining: "It does not matter, my audience sees only my right side."
joke: What’s the difference between an African elephant and an Indian elephant? About 5000 miles.
